name: branched-dextran exo-1,2-alpha-glucosidase

name: polymannuronate hydrolase

definition: Hydrolysis of (1->2)-alpha-D- and (1->6)-alpha-D- linkages in yeastmannan, releasing D-mannose

name: alpha-glucuronidase

name: chitinase

name: 4-alpha-D-{(1->4)-alpha-D-glucano}trehalose trehalohydrolase

name: galactan 1,3-beta-galactosidase

name: oligoxyloglucan reducing-end-specific cellobiohydrolase

To be a substrate, the first residue must beunsubstituted, the second residue may bear a xylosyl group, whetherfurther glycosylated or not, and the third residue, which becomes the newterminus by the action of the enzyme, is preferably xylosylated, but thisxylose residue must not be further substituted

name: mannosylglycoprotein endo-beta-mannosidase

name: fructan beta-(2,1)-fructosidase

synonyms: 1-FEH II|1-FEH w1|1-FEH w2|1-fructan exohydrolase|beta-(2,1)-D-fructan fructohydrolase|beta-(2-1)-D-fructan fructohydrolase|beta-(2-1)-linkage-specific fructan-beta-fructosidase|beta-(2-1)fructan exohydrolase|inulinase
